speaker: Archmage
lines: Balance is not absence—it's a braid of opposites held in the hand.
Hold steady, and the Weave will meet you halfway.
You have chosen the path of balance. You will be taught the ways of the mage, and the ways of the world.
You walk with the archmage into a large room of labrenthd shelves, filled with books and scrolls.
The archmage stops in front of a large book, the 'Book of Balance'.
He opens the book, and you see the words 'Balance is not absence—it's a braid of opposites held in the hand.'
The archmage closes the book, and you see the words 'Hold steady, and the Weave will meet you halfway.'
The archmage turns to you, raises his hands, and a beam of light fills the room.
You fall unconcious under the weight of the knowledge.
